result.eng: I would like to interview you.

result.eng: You will have to pay for parking on the side of the street.

result.orig: Beidh ort íoc as páirceáil ar thaobh na sráide

result.eng: You will have to repay the money.

result.ponchtml: Beiḋ ort laḃairt léi arísYou will have to talk to her again.

result.eng: I was going to phone you.

result.ga: Brostaigh ort

result.eng: I am always thinking of you.

result.eng: Whenever you feel like helping us, you will be welcome.

result.ga: Ná bíodh eagla ort a chailín
result.orig: Ná bíodh eagla ort a chailín
result.html: Ná bíodh eagla ort a chailínDon't be afraid, girl.
result.ponchtml: Ná bíoḋ eagla ort a ċailínDon't be afraid, girl.

result.eng: I will make you fall in love with me after we're married!
result.ga: Tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadh
result.orig: Tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadh
result.html: Tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadhI will make you fall in love with me after we're married!
result.ponchtml: Taḃarfaiḋ mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósaḋI will make you fall in love with me after we're married!

result.eng: He had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.
result.ga: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iad
result.orig: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iad
result.html: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iadHe had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé de ṁisneaċ aige t-léinte a ċaiṫeaṁ a ḃí ċoṁ teann sin go mbeaḋ eagla ort go bpollfaḋ a ḋidíní iadHe had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.

result.eng: You had to crouch down to get in there.
result.ga: Bhí ort dul síos ar do chromada chun dul isteach ann
result.orig: Bhí ort dul síos ar do chromada chun dul isteach ann
result.html: Bhí ort dul síos ar do chromada chun dul isteach annYou had to crouch down to get in there.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí ort dul síos ar do ċromada ċun dul isteaċ annYou had to crouch down to get in there.

result.eng: I am asking you to be my bridesmaid.
result.ga: Tá mé ag iarraidh ort seasamh liom ar lá mo phósta
result.orig: Tá mé ag iarraidh ort seasamh liom ar lá mo phósta
result.html: Tá mé ag iarraidh ort seasamh liom ar lá mo phóstaI am asking you to be my bridesmaid.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag iarraiḋ ort seasaṁ liom ar lá mo ṗóstaI am asking you to be my bridesmaid.

result.ga: Tá an drochshúil ort
result.orig: Tá an drochshúil ort
result.html: Tá an drochshúil ortSomebody wishes you bad luck.
result.ponchtml: Tá an droċẛúil ortSomebody wishes you bad luck.

result.eng: What do you want for it?
result.ga: Goidé tá a dhíth ort ar a shon
result.orig: Goidé tá a dhíth ort ar a shon
result.html: Goidé tá a dhíth ort ar a shonWhat do you want for it?
result.ponchtml: Goidé tá a ḋíṫ ort ar a ẛonWhat do you want for it?

result.eng: Get up quick and get dressed!
result.ga: Éirigh go gasta agus caith ort
result.orig: Éirigh go gasta agus caith ort
result.html: Éirigh go gasta agus caith ortGet up quick and get dressed!
result.ponchtml: Éiriġ go gasta agus caiṫ ortGet up quick and get dressed!

result.eng: There's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
result.ga: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúl
result.orig: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúl

result.ponchtml: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a ḋéanaṁ díom nuair a ḃeas mé ar ẛiúlThere's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?

result.eng: It doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ga: Is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.orig: Is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.html: Is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma dá mbíoḋ siad ag magaḋ ort go dtiteaḋ an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.

result.eng: I often heard my father talking about you.
result.ga: Is minic a chuala mé m'athair ag scéalaíocht ort
result.orig: Is minic a chuala mé m'athair ag scéalaíocht ort
result.html: Is minic a chuala mé m'athair ag scéalaíocht ortI often heard my father talking about you.
